name: FoundSalvage
title: Salvage
description: The crew spots a wrecked space probe just off the road!

name: fireROV
title: FIRE!
description: %n smells burning plastic and spots dark smoke rising from the ROV

name: TinkeringROV
title: Reworking
description: %n attempts to wire a subsystem into an existing ROV part…

name: MorePieces
title: Reworking
description: Amazingly it works! He restores a previously useless part to a like new condition!

name: LessPieces
title: Reworking
description: Disaster strikes, both the subsystem and the existing ROV part are lost…
